entry.title: Sunday: Light snow. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Light snow ending late this morning then cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 20. Wind chill near minus 32. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy overnight. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 38 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 25 December 2022
